analysis.Summary: IconGroups.vue is a Vue 3 single-file component that renders a scalable SVG icon representing a group of entities. It accepts a `fill` prop to customize the icon color.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, customizable "groups" icon within the UI toolkit of the application, enabling consistent styling and easy inclusion wherever a group/entity icon is needed.

Components.name: IconGroups
Components.role: Root component that encapsulates the SVG markup and exposes a `fill` prop for color customization.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue 3 Composition API helper that declares the component's props schema.

parameters.name: propsDefinition
parameters.description: An object defining the `fill` prop with its type and default value.

Dependencies.description: Used for declaring component props in the `<script setup>` block.

Notes: No `<style>` block is present; presentation is driven entirely by the SVG and the `fill` prop.
The default `fill` uses a CSS variable `--black`, allowing global theming.
Because it uses `<script setup>`, this component has zero runtime overhead for prop validation beyond Vue's built-in mechanisms.
